title: James Marshall, Rapper Kung Fu monk - Millionth hit special!
description:
James Marshall celebrates thenaturaltv's 1 Millionth hit with lost footage of a wacky live TV appearance on Chinese national TV in 2004. wtf? Some things are better left unexplained..
James next stop in NYC for Sasha Daygame's Direct Dating Summit.
http://www.thenaturallifestyles.com
http://www.directdatingsummit.com

BONUS footage of James speaking more Chinese on our other channel: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nwMKXziwfX4 Watch James Marshall pickup a model who has already rejected him - click here - http://bit.ly/1J1h80G
caption: false

channel_info.title: The Natural Lifestyles
channel_info.description: James Marshall, Shae Matthews, Alex León, & Virag Tierra bring you dating videos on how to be natural with women, improve your confidence and go for what you want in life.

transcription: Ladies and gentlemen of YouTubia, this is James Marshall reporting a little bit drunk because I had to have five shots of rakija because my friend Whistler had the birthday and she was crying and she was happy and she was crying. Anyway, today I have something very special for you. This is time to celebrate the one millionth view that the National TV has had on YouTube. So, as a special thanks to all that one million fans or, you know, I guess I've been hanging around Sasha too long when I'm doing that. To say thanks to the one million fans or possibly one really weird fan who watched it one million times, what I wanted to do was to drag something out of the archives. No, come back. That's wrong. No, don't approach me like that. That's not right. So, in 2004, I was in China. I had a shaved head and I was a monk, essentially. And believe it or not, I appeared on Chinese TV. What was I doing on Chinese TV? Well, nobody knew for the next ten years because the file type that this video was connected to was some obscure Chinese file that was totally incomprehensible. It wasn't until 2013 when I met the amazing Arthur Moore, who is now behind the camera, who finally cracked the code and was able to pull this piece of footage out, and now it is to be presented to the world. So, as a special thank you to my fans, to Arthur Moore, to Sasha Dagan for helping to make me famous, to all the awesome people that we've met on this incredible ride, and here's to many, many, many more hits in the future. I present to you the lost footage of James Marshall as a kung fu skiing monk. Thank you, everyone. Thank you. Hello. How do you do? What's your name? Ni hao. Wǒ de míng sè James. Oh, zhū wén chén me hǎo. Ai yǒu, James de zhēn de hěn lì hǎn, lián yǔ dōu kě yǐ tīng de dǒng. Your Chinese is very good. Nǎ James nǎ, James zài Aodàlià yǒu liǎng fēn gōng zuò. Dī fēn gōng zuò shì shén me nā? Your first job? Zhōng yī. Zhōng yī, nǐ shàn cháng shén me? Tui nǎ zhēn zhǒu. 那么第二份工作呢? Second job, gē shǒu. 你唱歌剧还是流行音乐? 这个时间安排得非常的紧凑啊, 就是白天给人扎针,晚上给人唱歌。 好,那么接下来在James练舞之前, 我们先听他,由他为我们演唱一段流行音乐,好不好? James, please. 来。 好。 这么个流行音乐当中, 用了也有气。 名字叫做Everyday,每一天。 Everyday. 好,我们建议大家都给我穿着练功夫来唱,拉拢。 拉拢。 拉拢。 好的,谢谢,谢谢,谢谢啊。 还有一位,每一天。 陈璐今天首唱了武术舞蹈的《香格》。 James刚才唱歌可以听得出来, 用的是气功。 接下来就为我们打一场拳,好不好? 大红拳,please. 请。 《香格》 《香格》 好,还不够呢。 谢谢。
